    • Method Detail

      • list

        List<org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject> list(VfsFileSet fileSet)
                                              throws org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
        Retrieve a list of virtual files base on criteria set by fileSet. This operation is expansive due to the native to remote scanning. So use includes/excludes wisely
        Parameters:
        fileSet -
        Returns:
        List of remote file objects
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
